Articles.Content:
I need to confess

Spoiler

I've been a lurker for a good 2 years! By the way, some of my posts have misspellings like this onw because im using a very old phone to do most of my forum posts ( the ones that are short) I started frequenting the forums after I learnt about getting mods and I used the forums as a way to find new ones. I also looked at some of the mission reports. After I got into modding, i needed a way to learn how to make mods and all, and created this account. 

Yes,  i know i have a lot of posts, but i've never really had an official introduction to the forums.

Edited May 10, 2022 by Watermel00n

If you were lurking, as you claim, how come your account has 132 posts? Huh? HUH? 

Anyway, hello.
Hello. You are not new here, I see you lots-ish.
I've seen you a fair amount, wouldn't call you a lurker. At least not recently...
